description.displayText: Brooke is a sweet, loving, and smart young lady. She has kept my children several times and she is just wonderful with them. Brooke is always timely and responsible. My children love when she keeps them. She not only tends to their needs, but she interacts and plays with them. You can't ask for a better, kinder, more responsible babysitter than Brooke. She is wonderful!
